results.content: The course is really short and doesn't show examples on advanced topics like redux with typescript, or how to improve the performance of apps. Also, most of the content is really brief, really showing only the basic examples and mostly copy-pasting. It's recommended to have some knowlendge on react before taking this course.
results.content_html: The course is really short and doesn't show examples on advanced topics like redux with typescript, or how to improve the performance of apps. results.content: I wouldn't really call it "Advanced". I thought the course mostly consisted of videos that just about scraped the surface of the topic. One example of this was the "React Dev Tools" video, just 1 minute long, showing how to install React Dev Tools, and at the end of the video, claiming that we have covered using React Dev Tools. I expected to go in dept to cover advanced topics, but the classes were only extremely high level.

results.content: Good for an experienced react developer, would be hard for a newbie. Would be nice to state this in the beginning of the course, on the knowledge level of the user
